verbs.description: [V: remembering] [ARG1: california 1928 st francis dam disaster] the potential for devastating floods led to the evacuation of 200 000 people in the northern california community of oroville during winter storms in february but nearly 90 years ago a nightmare became santa paula dam oxnard california st francis dam civil engineering sierra nevada us oroville santa clara riverbed california department of water resources california aqueduct william mulholland
